TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PointHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult

summary.span: 表示點擊測試的結果，這個點擊測試將 做為點擊測試參數。

span.span: Represents the results of a hit test that uses a as a hit test parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以執行的視覺物件上的點擊的測試，使用做為點擊測試參數，並傳回結果做。You can also perform a hit test on a visual object by using a as a hit test parameter and returning the result as a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 叫用測試使用幾何做為參數](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-hit-test-using-geometry-as-a-parameter.md)。For more information, see [How to: Hit Test Using Geometry as a Parameter](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-hit-test-using-geometry-as-a-parameter.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取傳回值，從方法。The following example shows how to retrieve the return value from the method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫預設點擊測試支援，在使用者定義的視覺物件。The following example shows how to override default hit test support in a user-defined visual object. 在此情況下，新會建立並傳回從覆寫的方法。In this case, a new is created and returned from the overridden method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#107)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#107)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VisualHit As Visual
public: property System::Windows::Media::Visual ^ VisualHit { System::Windows::Media::Visual ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得從點擊測試結果傳回的視覺物件。

span.span: Gets the visual object that is returned from a hit test result.

value.span: 物件，表示點擊測試結果。

span.span: A object that represents the hit test result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值可能無法代表單一的點擊測試期間的多個視覺物件。The value could potentially represent multiple visual objects during a single hit test. 點擊測試回呼方法定義您在視覺化樹狀結構中的特定視覺物件上，識別出點擊測試時執行的動作。The hit test callback method defines the actions you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. 您執行此動作之後，傳回值，決定是否繼續列舉任何其他視覺物件。After you perform the actions, you return a value that determines whether to continue the enumeration of any other visual objects. 傳回視覺物件順序是列舉的依照疊置順序呈現平面上。The order of enumeration of returned visual objects is by z-order on the rendering plane. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何存取屬性中的點擊測試結果回呼函式。The following example shows how to access the property in a hit test results callback function. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#102)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#102)]
